channel.description: Recent content in piwik on SpiderSoft

item.title: Piwik as a alternative to Google Analytics
item.description: Piwik is a downloadable, open source (GPL licensed) real time web analytics software program. It provides you with detailed reports on your website visitors: the search engines and keywords they used, the language they speak, your popular pages… and so much more. It’s great free open source alternative for Google Analytics. It’s easier and more readably for regular user to understand traffic on your website. What makes Piwik unique from the competition:
